metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4009 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before 1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SProcXFixesCreatePointerBarrier function. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4009` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xdmx-tools - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xmir - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xnest - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xorg-server-source - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xserver-common - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xserver-xephyr - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
